name: Leaping Lava
description:
Updated to version 1.1 with a super bonus hidden secret!

Inspired by Vimlark's Lava Leap game for the Backeys Game Jam

The floor is lava and luckily for you, it's not real! Try your best to get the fastest times and find all the hidden collectables.

There are 5 levels inspired by the original game as well as 5 collectables. If there's enough demand, I might add some more (harder) levels and collectables to find!

Controls with WASD controls on keyboard and also has gamepad controls as well.

The main playable character Devvy is provided by: https://www.youtube.com/c/DevEnabled
